snippet: Prison consulting is attracting a new crop of former convicts, but consultants are jostling for the competitive advantage.
abstract: Prison consulting is an increasingly popular and lucrative profession among ex-convicts; consultants offer services and advice to people about to prepare for prison time, for everything from help dealing with medical issues to requests for transfers or reduced sentences; Internet and social media have given the business a boost, and consultants are go-to guests on cable shows whenever a high-profile personality is indicted.
lead_paragraph: Prison consulting is attracting a new crop of former convicts, but consultants are jostling for the competitive advantage.

headline.seo: Prison Consulting Draws New Crop of Ex-Cons
